comment: Very sweet and personable. As long as you do what you are supposed to do he will work with you on any hardships you face. He is very understanding and open. He grades very very leniently. He is funny and great to get along with. I love this class

Over all, he was a funny person while in class.  The tests were fairly hard though and emphsized a lot of grammer concepts.  The Roleplays had to be done in the lab and with a partner.  My advice is to go in with a lot of questions, if you have any, on the review days before a test.  He is not very good with keeping his appointments in his office.
